ground_truth_reviews.comment: The `delete_post` endpoint is missing an authentication check. This is a critical security vulnerability as it allows any unauthenticated user to delete arbitrary posts from the system by simply knowing their ID. Please add an authentication dependency (e.g., `current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)`) to the function signature to ensure only authorized users can perform this destructive action.

title: feat: Add endpoint to delete posts
body: This change introduces a new DELETE endpoint at `/posts/{post_id}` to allow for the removal of posts. It integrates with the `PostService` to handle the deletion logic.
